  • Uses of Segment in com.geodesk.feature.polygon

    Methods in com.geodesk.feature.polygon with parameters of type Segment
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Ring
    RingBuilder.build(Segment firstSegment)
    Attempts to assemble closed Rings from a linked list of Segments, which can be in any order.
    static Ring
    RingBuilder.buildFast(Segment segment)
    Turns a series of Segments into a series of Rings, which works only if the Segments are ordered such that neighboring segments connect and form valid linear rings.
